law.catch_line: Applicability of open meetings and open records provisions.

text.section: The board shall comply with KRS Chapter 61 in regard to open meetings and open records in the conduct of ordinary business. In addition to the exemptions listed in KRS Chapter 61, proceedings to discuss rates, proposed rates, or anything that relates to rates if that discussion would jeopardize the competitiveness of the authority may be closed, as well as, proceedings which would provide an unfair competitive advantage to private sector competitors providing workers' compensation coverage in the Commonwealth.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 44, effective December 12, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 181, Part 12, sec. 59, effective April 4, 1994.
